thread.title: Best boutique hotel near the effiel tower
thread.title_full: Best boutique hotel near the effiel tower - Review of Le Derby Alma, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: roxanne m
title: Best boutique hotel near the effiel tower
text:
Beautiful boutique hotel. ...the staff is amazingly friendly. ...very professional, room was a good size. ..very clean. ..we had a room with partial view of the eiffel tower. .love my stayed. ..I will definitely come back and stay here. .
I give 5 stars
